messages.counselor_request_start:
Please follow these four steps in the right order to ensure your counseling request is scheduled correctly.

1ï¸âƒ£ - Contact Information
First you will be asked to provide your name, email, and phone number in a particular order.

2ï¸âƒ£ - Location
Next, you will need to confirm your CCI branch or the nearest one to you.

3ï¸âƒ£ - Note
You will be asked to provide a short note to give the counselor a sense of what you would like to discuss.

 Please follow the prompts in the right order to ensure a smooth processğŸ™.

Thank you for your patience and cooperation ğŸ¤©.

Use /cancel to cancel the operation at any time.

messages.help:
You can now use BUTTONS or the COMMAND MENU to pass commands to the bot.
Here's how the buttons below work

ğŸ‘‰ latest sermon - This gives you the most recent sermon available on the [website](http://ccing.org/sermons/)

ğŸ‘‰ get sermon - This helps you get a specific sermon by it's title. You can search using the exact title or a keyword.
Searching for a keyword (e.g Grace) would give you all sermon containing the keyword in their titles.

ğŸ‘‰ devotional - Get today's devotional

ğŸ‘‰ map - This helps you find the nearest MAP centre to your location.

You can other perform other commands using the COMMAND MENU.
These commands include:
â€¢ /cancel - Cancel any existing actionâœ–ï¸
â€¢ /menu - Get the default keyboardâŒ¨ï¸
â€¢ /membership - Register for membership schoolğŸ«
â€¢ /newsletter - Subscribe to the CCI NewsletterğŸ—
â€¢ /mute - Mute notifications from CCI BotğŸ˜”
â€¢ /unmute - Unmute bot notificationsğŸ¤©
